description: This is the quickest and easiest ice cream you will ever make!
keywords: Ice-cream,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Quick Banana Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Simply peel the bananas, chop them into 2cm chunks, and put them in a freezer container. Seal, and put in the freezer until frozen.

When the bananas are frozen solid, process them in a food processor with the vanilla extract, until you have a smooth, thick ice cream. You may need to scrape down the sides a couple of times during the process.
Either eat the softened banana ice cream immediately, or freeze for a few minutes for it to firm up once more before serving.
